alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:28AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis and Lake Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 227 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Tower, to 9 miles north of Fairbanks, to near French River, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Two Harbors around 245 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Robinson, Ely, Winton, Burntside Lake, Castle Danger, White Iron Lake and Isabella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
